Package model.DAO

Class DAOUser

java.lang.Object
model.DAO.DAOUser
public class DAOUser extends Object
La classe DAOCondition provvede ai metodi per manipolare le informazioni degli User dal database.

    • getUserFromResultSet

      private User getUserFromResultSet(ResultSet resultSet) throws SQLException
      Private helper method that takes a ResultSet object and constructs a User object from it.
      Parameters:
      resultSet - A ResultSet object containing a row from the User table.
      Returns:
      A User object constructed from the ResultSet.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If any database error occurs.

    • checkIfEmailExists

      public boolean checkIfEmailExists(String email)
      Checks if a given email is present in the User table.
      Parameters:
      email - The email to check.
      Returns:
      true if the email exists in the User table; false otherwise.

    • createUser

      public int createUser(String email, String password, int therapistId)
      Creates a new user in the User table.
      Parameters:
      email - The email of the user.
      password - The password of the user.
      therapistId - The ID of the therapist associated with the user.
      Returns:
      The ID of the newly created user, or -1 if an error occurs.

    • getUserByIdOrEmail

      public User getUserByIdOrEmail(Object idOrEmail)
      Retrieves a User from the User table based on an ID or an email.
      Parameters:
      idOrEmail - Either an Integer representing the User's ID or a String representing the User's email.
      Returns:
      The User object if found, or null if not found.

    • resetPassword

      public boolean resetPassword(String email, String newPassword)
      Resets a user's password.
      Parameters:
      email - The email of the user.
      newPassword - The new password to set for the user.
      Returns:
      true if the password was successfully updated; false otherwise.

      public boolean updateAnalyticsPreference(String userId, boolean value)
      Updates the user's analytics choice in the User table.
      Parameters:
      userId - The id of the user.
      value - The analytics choice value to set for the user.
      Returns:
      true if the choice was successfully updated; false otherwise.

    • updateEmailTime

      public boolean updateEmailTime(String id, String value)
      Updates the user's Email Time in the User table.

      value - The email time value to set for the user.
      Returns:
      true if the email time was successfully updated; false otherwise.
